mapper.select: SELECT l.id,l.username,l.password FROM loginInfo l LEFT JOIN userinfo u ON u.id = l.id WHERE (l.username = #{username} OR u.phone = #{username}) AND l.password = #{password} AND l.userType = #{userType};
mapper.update: UPDATE loginInfo SET loginTime = #{loginTime},login_ID = #{login_ID} WHERE id = #{id}
